summary: A schoolteacher and amateur sleuth suspects foul play when a fellow passenger on a sea-plane gets sick and dies.
cast: Edna May Oliver|James Gleason|Lola Lane|George Meeker|Dorothy Libaire|Harry Ellerbe|Chick Chandler|Willie Best|Leo G. Carroll|DeWitt Jennings|Spencer Charters|Arthur Hoyt|Matt McHugh|Morgan Wallace|Brooks Benedict|Harry Allen|Irving Bacon|James P. Burtis|Lynne Carver|Billy Dooley|Robert Homans|Rollo Lloyd|Pietro Sosso
keywords: catalina island|schoolteacher|hildegarde withers|shot in the back|hired murderer
title: Asesinato en la luna de miel
